qProperty.markdown: ^[~**#[_N.B : the figures showing are Current Year Full figures , please make sure to Select the Needed time frame to filter the data accordingly_](7)**~](center)^[#[**_~Full Budget: Initial Sales Budget  // Full Forecast : Current Full Forecast \(approved and Not Approved\) // Final Forecast : Approved from BU and RU~_**](7)](center)

extensionMeta.name: Sheet Navigation & Actions
extensionMeta.description: Sense Sheet Navigation + Actions visualization extension for Qlik Sense.
extensionMeta.author: Stefan Walther

qDef.qDef:
Pick
(
	([%SynHeadersFullRevised])
    
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  [Budget MT] )
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_Full_MT)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_MT)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_PM_MT)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_PM_MT)
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year_LY)} >}  [Invoice MT] )
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} , Semester = {'H1'}, Month = >}  [Budget MT] )
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} , Semester = {'H2'}, Month = >}  [Budget MT] )
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} , Semester = {'H1'}, Month = >}  [Full Revised Forecast MT] )
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} , Semester = {'H2'}, Month = >}  [Full Revised Forecast MT])
          ,Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  [Invoice MT] )

)

Pick
(
	([%SynHeadersFullRevised])
    
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  ([Budget Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_Full_SLS)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_SLS)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_PM_SLS)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_PM_SLS)
           ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year_LY)} >}  ([Invoice Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month =   >}  ([Budget Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}    ([Budget Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  ([Invoice Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))

)

Pick
(
            ([%SynHeadersFullRevised])
    
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  ([Budget Amount USD]+[Budget Misc Charges USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          , (Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}, Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}  >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} ,  [Full Revised Forecast Sales Manager Approval]  = {'Yes'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}  >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          , (Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} ,   [Full Revised Forecast Marketing Team Approval] = {'Yes'}, Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}    >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} ,   [Full Revised Forecast Marketing And Sales Approval] = {'Yes'} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}   >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
           ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year_LY)} >}  ([Invoice Amount USD]+[Invoice Misc Charges Provision By Weight Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month =   >}  ([Budget Amount USD]+[Budget Misc Charges USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}    ([Budget Amount USD]+[Budget Misc Charges USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD]+[Full Revised Forecast Misc Charges USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} >}  ([Invoice Amount USD]+[Invoice Misc Charges Provision By Weight Amount USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))

)

Pick
(
	([%SynHeadersFullRevised])
    
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}, Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}  >}  ([Budget Amount USD]- [Budget Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_Full_COP)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_COP)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_PM_COP)
          , $(v_Revised_Forecast_SM_PM_COP)
           ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}, Year = {$(v_Max_Year_LY)}  >}  ([Invoice Amount USD]- [Invoice Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month =   >}  ([Budget Amount USD]- [Budget Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}    ([Budget Amount USD]- [Budget Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H1'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD]-[Full Revised Forecast Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
          ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Revised Forecast Full'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))} , Year = {$(v_Max_Year)} ,Semester = {'H2'}  , Month = >}  ([Full Revised Forecast Amount USD]-[Full Revised Forecast Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))
           ,(Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} ,  [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}, Year = {$(v_Max_Year)}  >}  ([Invoice Amount USD]-[Invoice Cost USD])*[Currency Average Rate] ))

)
